00024 
00025 #ifndef SYX_LEXER_H
00026 #define SYX_LEXER_H
00027 
00028 #include "syx-platform.h"
00029 #include "syx-types.h"
00030 #include "syx-enums.h"
00031 
00032 #ifdef HAVE_LIBGMP
00033 #include <gmp.h>
00034 #endif
00035 
00036 SYX_BEGIN_DECLS
00037 
00038 /* Token */
00039 
00040 typedef struct SyxToken SyxToken;
00041 
00043 struct SyxToken {
00044   SyxTokenType type;
00045   union SyxTokenValue
00046   {
00047     syx_int32 integer;
00048 #ifdef HAVE_LIBGMP
00049     mpz_t *large_integer;
00050 #endif
00051     syx_double floating;
00052     syx_char character;
00053     syx_string string;
00054   } value;
00055 };
00056 
00057 extern EXPORT void syx_token_free (SyxToken token);
00058 
00059 /* Lexer */
00060 
00061 typedef struct SyxLexer SyxLexer;
00062 
00064 struct SyxLexer {
00065   syx_symbol text;
00066   SyxToken last_token;
00067   syx_char last_char;
00068 
00069   syx_symbol _current_text;
00070   syx_char _pushed_back;
00071 };
00072 
00073 extern EXPORT SyxLexer *syx_lexer_new (syx_symbol text);
00074 extern EXPORT void syx_lexer_free (SyxLexer *lexer, syx_bool free_text);
00075 
00076 extern EXPORT syx_char syx_lexer_forward (SyxLexer *lexer);
00077 extern EXPORT SyxToken syx_lexer_next_token (SyxLexer *lexer);
00078 extern EXPORT syx_char *syx_lexer_next_chunk (SyxLexer *lexer);
00079 extern EXPORT SyxToken syx_lexer_get_last_token (SyxLexer *lexer);
00080 extern EXPORT syx_char syx_lexer_get_last_char (SyxLexer *lexer);
00081 
00083 INLINE syx_char
00084 syx_lexer_push_back (SyxLexer *lexer)
00085 {
00086   lexer->_pushed_back = syx_lexer_get_last_char (lexer);
00087   return lexer->_pushed_back;
00088 }
00089 
00090 SYX_END_DECLS
00091 
00092 #endif
